trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZI003_03539_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Walmet is missing a Mystel.
TEXT_LUCKZI003_03539_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the missing Mystel.
TEXT_LUCKZI003_03539_TODO_01<tab>Aid the missing Mystel.
TEXT_LUCKZI003_03539_TODO_02<tab>Retrieve the sopping sacks of supplies.
TEXT_LUCKZI003_03539_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the sopping sacks of supplies to the missing Mystel.
TEXT_LUCKZI003_03539_TODO_04<tab>Speak with the missing Mystel.
TEXT_LUCKZI003_03539_WALMET_000_000<tab>Where is that Mystel? He should have been back by now...

TEXT_LUCKZI003_03539_WALMET_000_001<tab>I sent one of our newcomers to retrieve the supplies we had chilling in the river, and he has yet to return. I hope he hasn't run into trouble with the local dwarf clan...
TEXT_LUCKZI003_03539_WALMET_000_002<tab>If your travels take you in that direction, could you keep an eye out for our missing Mystel?
TEXT_LUCKZI003_03539_WALMET_000_003<tab>The newcomer─I've forgotten his name─was only meant to grab the sacks we had chilling upriver, then come straight back. I hope nothing bad has befallen him...
TEXT_LUCKZI003_03539_MYSTEL03539_000_010<tab>Can't...<gasp>...breathe...
TEXT_LUCKZI003_03539_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>The Mystel appears in need of a solid pat on the back.
TEXT_LUCKZI003_03539_MYSTEL03539_000_020<tab><pant> <pant> Phew...
TEXT_LUCKZI003_03539_MYSTEL03539_000_021<tab>Th-Thank you! I think...<huff>...I can breathe again...

TEXT_LUCKZI003_03539_MYSTEL03539_000_022<tab>I was just on my way back to the village when some Goggs started yelling at me. They were certainly cross about something, so I just ran away as fast as my feet would carry me...in the wrong direction, as it turns out.

TEXT_LUCKZI003_03539_MYSTEL03539_000_023<tab>Before I knew it, I'd collapsed here on the riverbank and dropped all my sacks into the water. They must've floated downstream, but I'm still...<puff>...too buggered...to go look for them...
TEXT_LUCKZI003_03539_MYSTEL03539_000_024<tab>Ugh, my chest...<huff>...is still heaving... I hope those sacks...<gasp>...don't get washed...over the falls...
TEXT_LUCKZI003_03539_MYSTEL03539_000_030<tab>Oh...are those my sacks?
TEXT_LUCKZI003_03539_MYSTEL03539_000_031<tab>I must say, this is a welcome relief! Let's just take a quick peek inside to see that everything's still─
TEXT_LUCKZI003_03539_MYSTEL03539_000_032<tab>Bah, I knew it! Only the wine's missing, and that means dwarves. They must've followed me...
TEXT_LUCKZI003_03539_MYSTEL03539_000_033<tab>Well, I'd best hurry home before I cross paths with them again. You should come too─no good deed should go unrewarded, after all!
TEXT_LUCKZI003_03539_MYSTEL03539_000_040<tab>Thank you again for your help. If you'd not found me, I might have fallen prey to some wild beast─or worse, a party of wine-drunk Goggs.
TEXT_LUCKZI003_03539_MYSTEL03539_000_041<tab>If only they were more like the Tholls. At least we can live alongside <var 1A 02 /var>those<var 1A 01 /var> dwarves in some semblance of harmony.
TEXT_LUCKZI003_03539_MYSTEL03539_000_042<tab>Anyway, here's the reward I promised you!
TEXT_LUCKZI003_03539_WALMET_000_043<tab>Thank you for finding our wayward Mystel. Were it not for you, he may have fallen in after the supplies and been washed away downriver!
